name: The 100 Room Maze
description:
Welcome Subject Number 0142

I first want to thank you for volunteering your time towards this project of ours

This is the 100 Room Maze

On paper it was described as a normal maze, it is not

This maze is one of absolute weirdness

It is a chaotic place that has taken many many lives

The souls of those very lives still remain, trapped in this repeating hell

You are tasked with one job subject, to not join them

Make it through this maze and the prize of which you were promised will be given to you

Please note, you will receive no help, you are entirely on your own

Also, there are people who are tasked to kill you, it is best to avoid them

If you’re having second thoughts…too bad, you’re already stuck here

Good luck.

-Warden

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game is in early access/Prototype phase. Looking for feedback at this time. 

This game was the result of the Finally Finish Something Game Jam that sadly never got finished in time, however is something that I still wanted to finish and now have. 

Please follow me on Twitter as I am going to be posting updates about projects I am currently working on over there.

Hope you guys enjoy this rather difficult game of mine.

Slight epilepsy warning for one of the rooms

**Best experienced with headphones**
